raw_text:
This Operator’s Guide describes the system components, operation, and operating procedures for the Pro Line Fusion Avionics System as installed in the Embraer Legacy 450/500 aircraft. It is not intended to be a training manual and it is not required for aircraft operation. It is a guide to understanding the system as designed by Rockwell Collins.

N

NOTE

The Rockwell Collins avionics units described in this guide show typical operation and capabilities. The non-Rockwell Collins avionics units may or may not cause typical operation. Refer to the appropriate vendor documentation for speciﬁc details on the non-Rockwell Collins avionics units.
